summary:
### GitHub Notifications Summary

#### **PrefectHQ/prefect**
- **Issues:**
  - "Fix markdown tests workflows" [#15781](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15781) - Requires attention as the author.
  - "sqlalchemy.exc.OperationalError: (sqlite3.OperationalError) syntax error in release 2.14.3" [#11104](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/11104)
  - "error when using run_deployment function in self-hosted prefect server" [#15780](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15780)
  - "Logs no longer automatically refresh in the UI" [#15779](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/issues/15779)

- **Pull Requests:**
  - "Include exception info when logging timeout errors" [#15629](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15629) - Review requested.
  - "Include env defaults from `variables.properties.env` in deep merge 2.x" [#15802](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15802) - Review requested.
  - "Update instructions on bug report issue template" [#15795](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15795) - Review requested.
  - "Enhancement: Disable Deployments" [#15129](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/pulls/15129)

- **Releases:**
  - "3.0.11.dev9: Nightly Development Release" [#181886406](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/releases/181886406)
  - "3.0.11: Thread Carefully" [#181838294](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/releases/181838294)
  - "3.0.11.dev8: Nightly Development Release" [#181664285](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/releases/181664285)

- **Check Suites:**
  - Multiple failed tests and cancelled workflows across various branches, such as the highlight-cached and soft-wrap-deployment-link branches, indicating ongoing CI issues.

- **Discussions:**
  - "Keep getting 'All connection attempts failed' while starting Prefect on Docker" [#15713](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/discussions/15713)
  - "Sharing expensive resources (objects) between run in the worker" [#15673](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect/discussions/15673)

#### **zzstoatzz/alternatebuild.dev**
- **Check Suites:**
  - "Deploy Next.js site to Pages workflow run failed for main branch" - Requires immediate attention due to CI activity.

#### **zzstoatzz/prefect-monorepo**
- **Check Suites:**
  - Multiple "Deploy flows to env workflow run failed for main branch" failures, suggesting potential CI/CD pipeline issues.

#### **PrefectHQ/ControlFlow**
- **Issues:**
  - "Fix broken link and broken code in docs" [#359](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/ControlFlow/pulls/359)
  - "`cf.run_tasks()` does not create a flow" [#361](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/ControlFlow/issues/361)

#### **PrefectHQ/nebula**
- **Releases:**
  - "2024.1024.211137" [#181818536](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/nebula/releases/181818536)
  - "2024.1023.195045" [#181572553](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/nebula/releases/181572553)

#### **PrefectHQ/prefect-collection-registry**
- **Pull Requests:**
  - "Update metadata for collection releases" [#430](https://api.github.com/repos/PrefectHQ/prefect-collection-registry/pulls/430) - Review requested.

### Urgent Items
- Several CI/CD failures and workflow issues in PrefectHQ/prefect and zzstoatzz repositories need immediate attention, especially those related to deployments and testing workflows.
- Pending reviews on pull requests in PrefectHQ/prefect that may require prompt action.
